pages.text: $(item)Similsax Transtructors$() can build away from you, though somewhat slowly. Sometimes you need a more instant placement method however. The $(item)Formation Wand$() will instantly build towards you from the block face you target, up to a maximum of 19 blocks placed. Shift-Right-Click a block to select which block(s) to place. If more than one, a random mix will be placed. Left-Click to clear selection.
